page.title: 18HORNDEAN GHOSTS
page.content: In Horndean the{Red Lion}pub is said to be haunted. The ghost that lives there is said to have stolen a dress from the owner. The next day she found it under her bed ripped up. One day a waitress is said to have turned round to see a glass smashing and a ghost of an old lady disappearing. In the{Ship and Bell}pub in Horndean there is said to be a ghost of an army officer. One day the owner was taking a tray up to her sick father when she was stopped by a ghostly figure of an army officer. In{Merchistoun Hall}the ghost of Admiral Murray is said to roam in his bedroom. His dark figure with flaming red eyes stares at you from the corner of his bedroom.
